body: Lol I didn't even think of fapping to this except since it's been a long time since I last checked the hentai animations I just reviewed over them and I saw the cover of this girl and read the description on that particular hentai it turns out this was Mind control (as you can see this didn't have the mind control tag so I just glossed over it since the plot was kinda stupid) and since I checked this out a couple months ago when this was on favorite and getting reposted I remembered the art and now I'm here 10/10.
Wish the animation were better. Its not the worst but rlly wish they got the witchsteel annerose level of production atleast
...Is it sad that I lost my arousal after reading this..and not in a good way like..sure this was good art in all but..i really found this to be a turn off..but again this is my opinion lol..
